subject: DID YOU AUTHORIZED.MRS VIVIAN
body:
DID YOU AUTHORIZED.MRS VIVIAN HENRY, TO CLAIM
I WRITE TO INFORM YOU THAT MRS VIVIAN HENRY CAME TO OUR OFFICE THIS
MORNING AND MADE IT CLEAR TO US THAT YOU HAS ACCIDENT AND YOUR IN THE
HOSPITAL THAT IS WHY YOU SIGN AGREEMENT CLAIMING WITH HER TO CLAIM
YOUR CASH CONSIGNMENT BOX VALUE $32. MILLION DOLLARS ON YOUR BEHALF.
AS YOUR NEXT OF KIN,
IN FACT THIS WAS THE BIGGEST SHOCK.I ASKED HER WHO AUTHORIZED HER TO
COME DOWN TO O'HARE INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT CHICAGO U.S.A WITH $100 FOR
CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE FOR THE COLLECTION OF THIS CASH CONSIGNMENT BOX
AND SHE TOLD US THAT YOU ASKED HER TO COME AND COLLECT THIS
CONSIGNMENT BOX ON YOUR BEHALF,
IF IT IS NOT TRUE THAT YOU HAS ACCIDENT KINDLY GO AHEAD AND SEND THIS
$100 TODAY FOR URGENT OBTAIN THE CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE TO RELEASE OF
THIS CASH CONSIGNMENT BOX TO YOU. AND WE WANT YOU TO RECONFIRM YOUR
DELIVERY ADDRESS TO AVOID WRONG DELIVERY WITH YOUR ID OR PASSPORT,AND
BEAR IT IN MIND THERE IS NO WAY THE FEE CAN BE DEDUCTED FROM YOUR
CONSIGNMENT BOX THAT IS THE LAW,
THIS IS BIGGEST SHOCK AND YOU ARE SERIOUSLY ADVISED TO GO AHEAD AND
SEND THE $100 I TUNES CARD OR STEAM WALLET GIFT CARD GENTLY SCRATCH IT
AND SEND THE PHOTO TO ME TO PROCEED IMMEDIATELY,
I ADVISED YOU TO TRY MUCH AS YOU CAN TO COME UP WITH THE NEEDED $100
TO URGENT OBTAIN THE CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE AND RELEASE YOUR
CONSIGNMENT BOX TO YOU,
NOTE: 
YOU HAVE A LIMITED TIME TO PAY THIS FEE TODAY AND TOMORROW
, IF
YOU FAIL TO COMPLY WITH US TODAY AND TOMORROW BY SEND THE FEE YOUR
CONSIGNMENT BOX WILL BE RELEASE TO MRS VIVIAN HENRY AS YOUR NEXT OF
KIN.
THANKS
MR.MARTHA WIILAM
UPS EXPRESS COURIER COMPANY

subject: Re: DID YOU AUTHORIZED.MRS VIVIAN
body:
Hello Wiilam,

Oh my, this is quite a surprise! I hope Mrs. Vivian Henry is doing well. I'm not in the hospital, thankfully. It's strange that she would say such a thing.

I'm curious about this cash box you mentioned. Can you tell me more about it? How did it come to be in my name? And why does Mrs. Vivian Henry want to claim it?

Also, could you explain what the Tunes card or Steam Wallet gift card is for? I've never used one before.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: DID YOU AUTHORIZED.MRS VIVIAN
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James
